title: Footwork, Ball Mastery and Coordination Training For Footballers/Soccer Players | Individual Drills
description:
Footwork and Coordination are essential for footballers and soccer players. Developing these skills will allow you to move better on the pitch, have more control over your body through different movements, and improve your ball handling.

Instagram: @michaellewiscunningham
Facebook: facebook.com/michaellewiscunningham
Twitter: @CunnyGoesHam

Workout reps/sets:
1. Forwards and Backwards Shuffle - 3 sets of 30 seconds
2. Ladder Exercises - 3 reps of each exercise
3. Ball Mastery Exercises - 30 seconds each exercise
4. Fast Feet Square - 10 reps on of each exercise on the outside of the square, 20 seconds of freestyle inside the square between each exercise.

title: 1000 Touch Workout Pt 2 | Improve Ball Control With No Equipment
description:
In today's training session we are getting 1000 touches of the ball using all the different surface areas of the foot to develop control and confidence with the ball at our feet. Ronaldinho claimed to deliberately get 1000 extra touches outside of his team's training sessions, which contributed to his incredible ability on the ball. With this 1000 touch workout, you can increase your ability to manipulate the ball in tight space dribbling situations. 

Full workout: 

Inside outside right foot - 50 repetitions
Inside outside left foot - 50 repetitions 
Inside inside - 100 repetitions
Inside outside both feet - 50 repetitions
Sole rolls - 100 repetitions
Inside V cuts - 50 repetitions
Outside V cuts - 50 repetitions
L drags - 50 repetitions
Sole pushes - 100 repetitions
Cruyffs - 100 repetitions

title: 1000 Touch Home Workout | Stay Sharp On The Ball At Home
description:
In today's video we are completing a 1000 touch workout that can be done inside your home with very little space. During this workout you will get touches with all the different surface areas of the foot both on the ground and also juggling to keep your ball mastery and touch sharp during times when training outside isn't possible.

Below is the full workout: 

Sole Roll x 100 (100 touches)
Squares x 25 clockwise, 25 anti-clockwise (200 touches)
Alternate V Cuts x 50 (100 touches)
Double Sole L Drag x 25 (100 touches)
Triangles x 30 right, 30 left (180 touches)
Laces Sole Push Pull x 25 right, 25 left (100 touches)
Single Leg Juggles x 50 right, 50 left (100 touches)
Alternating Juggles x 100 (100 touches)
Freestyle Ball Mastery x 30 seconds (as many touches as possible)

Check out my 7 day training programs here: https://www.7mlctraining.com/shop

title: Individual Ball Mastery Training Exercises | Full Ball Mastery Training Session For Footballers
description:
In today's video, I share a full ball mastery training video you can use to improve your ball mastery and close control dribbling. Ball mastery is one fo the most effective ways to develop your close control dribbling and manipulation of the ball. title: 5 Easy Close Control Skills | Individual Ball Mastery Exercises
description:
n
In today's video I show you 5 east close control exercises to improv your control and close control dribbling in tight spaces. being bale to control the ball in tight spaces will help you dribble in situations where you have 2-3 defenders around you and allow you to keep possession of the ball. Try out these 5 easy ball mastery exercises for yourself and see improvements in you ball control on the pitch.

Your first touch in football is your most important touch. Mastering your first touch allows you to set yourself up to play passes, shots, beat defenders and so much more. With these simple drills, you can master your first touch and improve your performance on the pitch.

title: Easy 10 Minute Individual Ball Mastery Session | Improve Your Close Control
description:
n


Get MAESTRO 2.0 here: https://www.7mlctraining.com/shop/maestro-20-ball-mastery-redefined

Full Training Session: 

Dynamic Ball Mastery (dribble from sideline to edge of 18 yard box and back)

Croqueta x 1
Inside Outside x 1
Inside - Inside - Sole x 1

Rest for one minute

1 cone ball mastery (30 seconds per exercise, 30 seconds rest between each)

Croqueta x 30 seconds
Squares x 30 seconds
V's x 30 seconds
L Drags x 30 seconds

Rest for one minute

Staggered cone ball mastery (dribble to the end of the cones and back to the start for each exercise)

Right foot inside - outside x 1
Left foot inside - outside x 1
V's x 1
V - Sole Roll right x 1
V - Sole Roll left x 1
Croqueta x 1

Perform one round of circuit as a dribbling warm up, or repeat circuit 3 times for a full ball mastery training session.

Ball Mastery is a great tool to improve your ball control and improve your football skills to help you keep the ball in tight spaces during a match.

 In this tight space ball mastery soccer training session, we focus on improving your ball control and footwork in confined areas. This session will help you develop quick decision-making skills, improve your close ball control, and enhance your ability to maintain possession under pressure. title: 1vs1 Dribbling Soccer Drill | Attacking \u0026 Defending Exercises
description:
This competitive 1vs1 training drill (exercise) develops attacking and defending skills in one vs one situations. Economical practice as we can train and coach both sides of the ball if desired. 
For attacking: dribbling, close control, feints, moves, turns and changes of direction.  
For defending: blocking, tackling, delay, reactions.
Coaches can easily coach during natural stoppages either defending or attacking skills.  The drill can also be used as a warm-up or fun game for a variety of ages (Youth, kids, club, high-school, college).

title: Improve Your Dribbling Speed and Control | 3 Simple Dribbling Training Drills For Footballers
description:
As the speed of the game increases, so should your dribbling and with these 3 simple but effective dribbling drills, you can increase your dribbling speed significantly. The best dribblers in the world have the ability to dribble with the ball almost as fast as they can run without it, making them incredibly dangerous with the ball at their feet. Apply these dribbling drills into your training session and improve your dribbling technique and start moving quicker with the ball and you'll find yourself running past defenders. Players like Messi, Ronaldo, Hazard, Mbappe and Neymar are all able to reach high speeds while having the ball under full control. Take your speed dribbling to the next level with these simple and easy speed dribbling tips, and use this how to dribble with speed tutorial to start dribbling faster with the ball under control.

title: Perfect Your First Touch | 5 First Touch Exercises For Footballers
description:
Build your website with Squarespace: https://www.squarespace.com/?channel=youtube\u0026subchannel=7mlc\u0026source=7mlc

title: 5 Shooting Techniques Explained | Learn How To Strike The Ball With This Step By Step Tutorial
description:
Enjoy this 5 essential shooting techniques tutorial that every striker and attacker needs to learn. There are many different shooting techniques in football, and having a variety of ways to shoot the ball in your repertoire will help you to deceive the goalkeeper and score more goals. In this simple shooting technique breakdown, you can learn essential shooting techniques in just a few easy steps. From adding more power, swerve/curve/curl, knuckle, dip and accuracy, this tutorial can level up your long range shooting capabilities. Knowing how the ball will react when you strike it is important for developing shooting consistency, and by following the advice shared in this shooting technique tutorial, you can have more control over your shots and start putting the ball in the back of the net more often.

description:
Scoring goals as a winger is an important quality to have in the modern game. As a winger, having the ability to score and set up goals increases your value as a player, and importance to your team. In today's video I share some drills and exercises, including explanation of moves and ways to create space in order to score goals. By using these exercises often in your individual training sessions, you can improve your confidence on the ball around the edge of the box, to beat defenders and get shots away. By repeating these actions over an over again in your winger training sessions, you'll find yourself creating more chances and scoring more goals in a match.

In this video, I you through key drills and techniques to enhance your finishing ability and positioning in front of goal. Whether you’re working on your left or right foot, improving your crossing timing, or learning how to create goal-scoring opportunities, this session is perfect for wingers who want to take their game to the next level.

In this video, you’ll learn:
 • How to position yourself to get in goal-scoring positions
 • Techniques to finish with precision and power
 • Drills that focus on quick decisions and sharp movement
 • How to master shooting from different angles and situations

Perfect for players looking to sharpen their attacking skills and improve your goal-scoring instincts and become a more dangerous winger!

title: Acceleration Drill - How to Increase Speed for Soccer
description: If you want to know how to increase speed for soccer, it's important to focus on speed acceleration. Soccer players need to get up to speed quickly, which is where acceleration drills come into play.  By developing the power needed to accelerate quickly, you are much more likely to get to balls first and win the 5, 10, or 30 yard sprints that happen so often in soccer.  If you want to know how to increase speed for soccer, here's a great power building acceleration drill.

title: Lean Fall Run x 10 Yard Sprint (Soccer Speed)
description: Slowly fall forward with your body straight bending only at the angles. You'll feel like you are going to fall.  At the last second drive your leg out and accelerate into a 10 yard sprint.  You want to get at least a 45 degree angle with your body to the ground.

title: Pogo Jumps | Single Leg Pogo Jumps | Soccer Plyometrics
description: Pogo jumps and single-leg pogo jumps are fundamental level-one plyometrics exercises all soccer players should have in their training program.  The ability to explode quickly and get up to speed in a matter of steps is an important part of soccer success.  Being fast over 70 yards can be good, but it's a lot more important in soccer to be fast over 5, 10, 20, or 30 yards.  Getting up to top speed as quickly as possible gives you a huge advantage.  Be sure and add some pogo jumps to your soccer speed program to develop a more explosive first step.

title: Tuck Jump To Broad Jump | Soccer Speed
description: Tuck Jump to Broad Jump - pull those knees up as high as possible.  Land softly and quickly explode forward into a broad jump.

title: How To Get Faster For Soccer | Increase Your Soccer Speed
description: If you want to succeed at a high level on the pitch, you need to increase your soccer speed. Here's how to get faster for soccer, become more explosive, smoke defenders, and win more 50/50 balls.  Let's go!

title: 5 POWERFUL Exercises To INCREASE Your Soccer SPEED So You Are Quicker \u0026 More EXPLOSIVE!
description: In this video we talk about the two different types of speed, why one is a lot more important than the other, and go over 5 exercises that can help you increase your speed as quickly as possible. Let's go!

title: POWERFUL And FUN Competitive Game For Young Soccer Players | Dribbling, Passing \u0026 Finishing!
description: Here's a great technical drill you can use for close dribbling, speed dribbling, passing, and finishing in a competitive and fun environment.
